githapi 0.0.0
  • Reference

Reference

Repositories

Functions for accessing information about repositories and their content.

gh_repository()

Get information about a repository.

is_repository()

Check whether the input is a valid repository

gh_repositories()

Get information about a user's, organisation's or team's repositories.

gh_tags()

Get information about all the tags in a repository.

gh_branch()

Get information about a branch.

is_branch()

Checks whether the input is a valid branch.

gh_branches()

Get information about all the head commits in each branch.

gh_commit()

Get information about a commit.

is_valid_sha()

Check whether the input is a valid SHA-1

gh_commit_sha()

Get the SHA-1 of a commit reference

gh_commits()

Get information about all the history of commits.

gh_compare_commits()

Compare two commits

gh_compare_files()

Compare the files of two commits

gh_readme()

Get the README

gh_contents()

Get contents of a file.

gh_download()

Download the entire tree from a commit.

is_collaborator()

Check if a user is a collaborator

gh_collaborators()

List collaborators

gh_permissions()

Review a user's permission level

gh_commit_comment()

Get a single commit comment

gh_commit_comments()

List comments for a single commit or entire repository

gh_contributers()

List contributors

gh_languages()

List languages

gh_release()

Get a single release

gh_releases()

List releases for a repository

gh_asset()

Get a single release asset

gh_assets()

List assets for a release

Gists

Functions for accessing information about gists and their contents.

gh_gist()

Get a single gist

gh_gists()

List a user's gists, or all public or starred gists.

gh_gist_commits()

List gist commits

is_gist_starred()

Check if a gist is starred

gh_gist_forks()

List gist forks

gh_gist_comment()

Get a single comment

gh_gist_comments()

List comments on a gist

gh_save_gist()

Save files in a gist

gh_source_gist()

Source an R file from a gist

Git Data

Functions for accessing git data directly.

gh_git_blob()

Get a blob

gh_git_commit()

Get a commit

gh_git_reference()

Get a reference

is_tag()

Check whether the input is a valid tag.

gh_git_references()

Get all references

gh_git_tag()

Get an annotated tag

gh_git_tree()

Get a tree

gh_save()

Download files and save them to a location

gh_source()

Source an R file

Issues

Functions for accessing information about issues and their contents.

gh_issue()

Get a single issue

gh_issues()

List issues for a repository

gh_user_issues()

List issues assigned to the authenticated user

gh_assignees()

List assignees for issues in a repository

gh_issue_comments()

List comments on an issue

gh_issue_comment()

Get a single issue comment

gh_label()

Get a single label

gh_labels()

List all labels for an issue, milestone or repository

gh_milestone()

Get a single milestone

gh_milestones()

List milestones for a repository

gh_event()

Get a single event

gh_events()

List events for an issue or all issues in a repository

Pull Requests

Functions for accessing information about pull requests and their contents.

gh_pull_request()

Get a single pull request

gh_pull_requests()

List pull requests

gh_pull_commits()

List commits on a pull request

gh_pull_files()

List pull requests files

is_pull_merged()

Get if a pull request has been merged

gh_pull_review()

Get a single review

gh_pull_reviews()

List reviews on a pull request

gh_pull_comment()

Get a single pull request review comment

gh_pull_comments()

List review comments on a pull request or all pull requests in a repository.

gh_pull_review_requests()

List pull request review requests

Projects

Functions for accessing information about projects and their contents.

gh_project()

Get a project

gh_projects()

List organisation or repository projects

gh_column()

Get a project column

gh_columns()

List project columns

gh_card()

Get a project card

gh_cards()

List project cards

Organizations

Functions for accessing information about organizations.

gh_organization()

Get an organization

gh_organizations()

List organizations

is_member()

Check membership

gh_members()

Get Organization or team members list

gh_membership()

Get organization and team membership

gh_memberships()

List your organization memberships

gh_team()

Get team

gh_teams()

List teams

is_manager()

Check if a team manages a repository

Users

Functions for accessing information about users.

gh_user()

Get a single user

gh_users()

Get all users

gh_user_email()

List email addresses for the authenticated user

GitHub API

Functions for accessing the GitHub API.

is_url()

Checks whether the supplied object is a valid URL

is_sha()

Checks whether the supplied object is a valid SHA

is_repo()

Checks whether the supplied object is a valid repo name

gh_token()

Retrieve the GitHub personal access token

gh_url()

Build the URL for the github API

gh_get()

Send a http GET request to the specified GitHub url.

gh_page()

Get and parse the contents of a github http request, including multiple pages.

gh_download_binary()

Download a binary file from GitHub
